title: Permanent residence cards (Green Card, ILR, PR)
dataVerified: Full name, DOB, nationality, residence status, card number, biometrics
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake permanent residence cards. Domain binding verifies immigration authority. Employment eligibility verification (I-9). Benefits eligibility. Travel document. For privacy, issuers can add a random salt line to raise entropy and defeat guessing attacks. High-value fraud target.
